title: Why can't I change my client language to korean?
body:
I've  tried everything, it is no longer an option even when going into notebook and manually changing it, there is no korean language or server that I can switch to. Does anyone have any advice or am i stuck with english/NA?
?

replies.body: You won't be able to change the NA client language to Korean since that isn't one of the [**supported language packs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594) for this region.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NLtYzWPu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-13T21:38:40.429+0000)
>
> You won't be able to change the NA client language to Korean since that isn't one of the [**supported language packs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594) for this region.

Hmm, while I am not from NA, this is supposed to work on all servers, so is [this](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6dy3n6/since_alot_of_people_are_trying_to_change_there/) safe to use/try?
For that process, I would simply refer to our [**third party program faq **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)and keep that information close in mind.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NLtYzWPu,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-08-15T04:48:14.487+0000)
>
> For that process, I would simply refer to our [**third party program faq **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)and keep that information close in mind.

I might be late, I'm usually at EU Boards, but the method I found requires no third party programs, it's all Riot gives us with the game. Also, it gives no advantage over other players because it's just voice and text(again everything official).
Can I ask why NA can't use French? since you know.. Canada's 2nd official language is French and so far in my games I've met a LOT of Quebec players.
